name: LD49_Insomnia
description:
Recommend with Headphones: This is a 2-minutes game, and I pay a lot of effort on audio and music. I would be glad if you could finish this short game!

WARNING: This Game's Content May Be uncomfortable/disturbing to Some Audiences. 

Input: mouse (LMB) and WASD/Arrow Keys

------

So This is the LD49. I made a game that talks about Insomnia. I can sleep now thanks to so many things.

An unstable mental state could be dangerous, especially when you are under pressure. I would like to tell you about how it feels. And care for yourself in your life.

Just like the ending goes, I wish anyone who plays this game could be healthy physically and mentally.

祝您身心健康。

-------

Compo Assets List:

  • Arts: Figma, PS
  • Code: Unity
  • Audio: Studio One, Freesound.org
  • Font: DEBUG_MVDyB
